item.description:
September 17, 2010 at 5:19pm


At this point we are trying to get as many people as we can to commit to being at the UN flag at the mall to basically stand around and look smart and brave while Bobby and Adam handle the rest. We will attempt to have media and the mall owner who placed a flag present for a request of its removal. Peacefully and politely of course. Can you please tell whoever you think may want to be a part?

Warwick Mall, outside food court, 5:00 PM Tuesday on the 21st



Thanks Paula for being alert and noticing this.
item.name: The UN Flag at Warwick Mall
